en.end: Finally free, thank you so much for playing!
en.intro_1: Locked up in this place for so many years...
en.intro_2: Finally I can get out of this place, I just have to defeat the 12 guardians and I will be free.
en.intro_3: I have to move with the keyboard to the doors and press 'Space' to open them.
en.intro_4: That way I will defeat the guardian and get out of this castle.
en.tutorial1_1: Since there are 2 portions of 1/2 in 1 unit then there must be 3 times 2 portions in 3 units.
en.tutorial3_1: Since 3 ÷ 1/2 = 6, then 6 times 1/2 must be equal to 3
en.tutorial4_1: Since I am dividing a whole number number by a fraction (4 ÷ 2/3). I can turn the whole number into a fraction (4/1)
en.tutorial4_2: Now that I have a division of fractions. I can solve it by doing a cross multiplication.
en.killBoss6: I have cleared half of the doors, soon I will escape.
en.killBoss12: I have cleared all of the doors, I must enter the final door.
en.enterLastBoss: I thought this door was the way out, but it looks like there is a final guardian waiting for me, this will be a really hard fight.
en.killLastBoss: The way out! I can see it, it's my chance to get out of here.
